questions.question_text: Which of the following objects weighs more than a kilogram?
questions.answer_choices: An app.                A watermelon.        A banana.            A peach.

questions.question_text: Which of the following objects is the lightest?
questions.answer_choices: A feather. A pencil. A rock.  A book.

questions.question_text: What is the weight of a pencil in grams?
